---
output: 
  pdf_document:
    keep_tex: false
    fig_caption: yes
    latex_engine: pdflatex
    template: theme/resultsReport.tex
geometry: margin=0.7in
papersize: letterpaper
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
receiber: "Dr. X"
id: "`r client`"
analista: "Alfredo Mendoza"
brigada: "A1"
nsamples: "`r as.character(n_samples)`"
allsamples: "`r as.character(allsamples)`"
sampling: 
processingdate: "`r processingdate`"
method: "`r unique(my_r$method)`"
fontfamily: fontenc
fontsize: 11pt
header-includes:
   - \linespread{1.05}
graphics: true
width: 1
logoposition: center
logo: theme/inmegenlogosalud.pdf
---

```{r echo=F, warning=F, results='asis'}

library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
kable(my_r, row.names = FALSE, col.names = c("Número consecutivo","ID INMEGEN", "ID Institución", "Institución", "Nombre de paciente/proyecto", "Tipo de muestra", "Resultado"), 
			align = "llcccr", format="latex", booktabs=TRUE, escape = FALSE) %>% 
kable_styling(latex_options = c("repeat_header", "striped", "scale_down"), fixed_thead = TRUE)
```
